/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the urban landscape. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting different parts of the city. The image is captured from a low angle, emphasizing the height of the buildings and the bridge, and creating a sense of depth and scale. The colors in the image are rich and natural, with the green of the trees and grass, the blue of the sky, and the gray of the buildings creating a harmonious palette. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing the city's blend of natural beauty and urban development.
